data.title: Present Laughter (PG)
data.meta_description:
2.00pm - Pay What You Can £20.00 / £15.00 / £10.00
by Noël Coward

The multi award-winning production of Noël Coward’s provocative comedy featuring Andrew Scott (Vanya, Fleabag) returns to the big screen.
As he prepares to embark on an overseas tour, star actor Garry Essendine’s colourful life is in danger of spiralling out of control. Engulfed by
data.text:
OPENING HOURS FOR SUMMER 2024

This July, the Byre building is open Monday to Saturday 10.00am – 4.30pm. When there is a performance, the building is also open in the evenings and on Sundays two hours before the start time, closing half an hour after the end of the event.

Box Office, level 2

Box Office is open 10.00am – 4.30pm Monday to Saturday, except when there is an evening event, when it remains open until after the performance starts. It is closed on Sundays, unless there is a performance, when box office opens two hours before the start time.

Café Bar, level 1

BrewCo at the Byre, on Level 1, is operating on reduced opening hours until further notice but is open for the start of most performances.

Apologies for this inconvenience but, when there’s no bar service, you can buy soft drinks and snacks from the Byre Kiosk on Level 2. Please keep an eye out for updates as we continue to work on improving your options for snacks and drinks at the Byre.

Study Space, level 2

A popular, informal study space, available to anyone looking for an alternative to home or the library. Open Monday – Saturday 10.00am – 4.30pm.

THE BYRE BUILDING AND BOX OFFICE PHONE LINES ARE CLOSED FOR STAFF TRAINING

Tuesday 30 July from 1.30pm

THE BYRE IS CLOSED THROUGHOUT AUGUST

This August, due to essential maintenance, access to the building is restricted. The Café Bar and foyers are closed but the Box Office remains open with access through the Level 2 entrance only (down the close opposite Jannetta’s on South Street).

The Byre’s usual busy programme of performances and events resumes in September.

You can always find information on what’s happening and book on this website.
